title: KIM SWITCH / DESERTER TACTICS
description: Kim talks to you on the side and says you got him, push motive angle.

dialogueTree.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We just need to get him back to th..."
dialogueTree.text: "We just need to get him back to the mainland." A crooked little smile. "We actually did it..."

links.title: You: ""We really did, didn't we?""
links.text: "We really did, didn't we?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He smiles. "You should be proud. Co..."
links.text: He smiles. "You should be proud. Come on -- let's wrap this up."

links.title: You: ""Let's get him back before we congr..."
links.text: "Let's get him back before we congratulate ourselves."

dialogueTree.title: You: ""Do you think he did it?""

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He nods. "From nothing to this in a..."
links.text: He nods. "From nothing to this in a day..." A crooked little smile. "This is *good*, we just need a confession first, and then *maybe* a solid motive later."

links.title: You: ""I'm slapping myself to get ideas!""
links.text: "I'm slapping myself to get ideas!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I can see that, yes. I'm not judgi..."
links.text: "I can see that, yes. I'm not judging."

links.title: You: ""I'm trying to get him to confess...""
links.text: "I'm trying to get him to confess..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, good going -- that should be..."
links.text: "Yes, good going -- that should be our *first* priority."

links.title: You: ""How do you think the questioning i..."
links.text: "How do you think the questioning is going?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good." He nods. "We're doing very..."
links.text: "Good." He nods. "We're doing very good. He *wants* to confess -- I can see that. We just need to pile it on, a little more -- the more we have on him, the closer he is..."

links.title: Logic: "You hear that? He thinks you're *th..."
links.text: You hear that? He thinks you're *this* close...

links.title: You: ""What can I put on him -- to get hi..."
links.text: "What can I put on him -- to get him to fess up?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""He's a communard. The victim was a..."
links.text: "He's a communard. The victim was a mercenary. We should get him talking politics again. You could even tell him we already *have* a motive."

links.title: You: ""What am I missing? What haven't I..."
links.text: "What am I missing? What haven't I done?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Also, the gun." He smiles very pol..."
links.text: "Also, the gun." He smiles very politely. "We should pick it up and discuss it in front of him. Make a show of it."

links.title: Drama: "Yes, sire! Make a production of thi..."
links.text: Yes, sire! Make a production of this examination!

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Well, I can think of one thing. Th..."
links.text: "Well, I can think of one thing. The gun." He smiles very politely. "We should pick it up, and discuss it in front of him. Make a show of it."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Ballistics. Let him cook here for..."
links.text: "Ballistics. Let him cook here for a minute or two -- we can have another look at the set-up he had there, with the mattress." He nods southeast to the tower. "Ballistics always impresses these military types."

links.title: Suggestion: "It doesn't have to hold in court. J..."
links.text: It doesn't have to hold in court. Just establish a line of sight and he'll do the rest himself.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Ballistics. Let him cook here for..."
links.text: "Ballistics. Let him cook here for a minute or two -- we can have another look around the island for a sniper's nest." He looks to the small tower on the coast. "I think we should check out the post."

links.title: You: ""Okay, let's do this." (Conclude.)"
links.text: "Okay, let's do this." (Conclude.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Remember," the lieutenant whispers..."
links.text: "Remember," the lieutenant whispers. "He wants to tell us -- but he doesn't want to *help* us. It needs to look like we already have everything."

links.title: Empathy: "There is palpable excitement in his..."
links.text: There is palpable excitement in his tone. He likes him for this -- *a lot*. But there's something more too...

links.title: Logic: "He thinks the deserter has more tha..."
links.text: He thinks the deserter has more than just this case in him. Forty-four years here...

links.title: You: ""You think he has more? Than this c..."
links.text: "You think he has more? Than this case?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Oh yes..." He nods. "And -- he has..."
links.text: "Oh yes..." He nods. "And -- he hasn't spoken to anybody in a long time. If we get him open, who knows what will pour out..."

links.title: You: "Pat him on the back. [Leave.]"
links.text: Pat him on the back. [Leave.]

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Remember," the lieutenant whispers..."
links.text: "Remember," the lieutenant whispers. "He wants to tell us -- but he doesn't want to *help* us. It needs to look like we already have everything."
